name: Drillte
description:
Your goal:

Drill apart asteroids and fling them into the unstable white dwarf star to prevent it from exploding, while racking up points. Green chunks add time before the star explodes, red chunks take time, and blue chunks give points.

Your controls:

  • Up Arrow / W - Thrust
  • Left & Right Arrows / A & D - Turning
  • X / Space / Left Mouse - Grab an asteroid, release to throw into the sun

Your other controls:

  • 1~9 - Scale Window
  • 0 - Toggle Fullscreen
  • N - Toggle Pixel Filter
  • M - Mute
  • Escape - Pause

Background art by attfooy       

Main theme by Mista Jub (https://mistajub.bandcamp.com/)

Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 Jam.
